alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Fulton (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 5:00PM CDT until July 01 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Fulton County in north central Arkansas... Northern Baxter County in north central Arkansas... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 459 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 2 miles southwest of Mountain Home, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mountain Home... Gassville... Briarcliff... Diamond Bay... Ott... Gamaliel Landing... Fawn Park... Colfax... Vidette... Gamaliel... Buford... Robinson Point Landing... Henderson... Gepp... Norfork Lake... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
